basics.name: Elis Diep
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the Department of The Electrical & Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2023.

work.company: University of Hawaii Center for Language of Technology
work.summary: Monitor the computer lab room for open hours or reserved times. Ensure the lab is kept clean
highlights: Maintain and monitor the lab room for guest to use
Making sure that people follow the rules

experience.summary: UAV software lead. I work with a team of 5 people. That is working on creating a quadcopter that will fly autonomously and mimic paylaod delivery
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Hand out weekly task to my team and ensure progress is made weekly
Working on a data trasnfer for image processing as a capstone project
